com.ogprover.utilities.logger
Interface ILogger

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileLogger
public interface ILogger

Interface description:
Basic interface for OGP logger facility. If additional specific functionality is required, the best would be to derive a new logger interface from this basic interface.

Version:
1.00
Author:
Ivan Petrovic

Field Summary
static java.lang.String VERSION_NUM
           Version number of interface in form xx.yy where xx is major version/release number and yy is minor release number.
